reviewText: You don't have to be a biker to like this piece. And you don't have to be a man to like it either! From where I'm standing since I'm both, girls can like it too cause it shows you what women with attitude can do. I like the babes on this video cause they have this "sassy come and flirt with me but I aint available" kinda look making any hot blooded male confused. Its pretty much ok. could have been great though If they chose a more unique soundtrack to accompany the visuals. I mean Heavy Metal music has been done to death whenever you see gals on wheels! A few pieces by Verdi would have done wonders to it. But that's asking too much from a video whose main intention is to wet your appetite on two of the greatest things ever to grace the planet, BABES AND BIKES!
